name: saucily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a rude way that shows no respect, or in a way that refers to sex, especially in a humorous way: His father sent him to his room for speaking to him saucily. She winked saucily at the man in the front row.
More examplesFewer examplesIt's basically a saucily comic road movie.She wore a slinky, black satin dress, saucily cut away at the sides.Don't speak to me so saucily!She grinned at him saucily and turned to leave.
